amendatorysection.catchline: State assistance to political subdivision or nonprofit corporation; commission; approval of application; failure to approve applications; effect; quorum.
amendatorysection.para: (1) After consideration of the application, the commission shall issue a finding of whether the use described in the application is eligible for state assistance.
(2) If the commission finds that the use described in the application is a legitimate use and that state assistance is in the best interest of the state, the application shall be approved.
(3) If no applications are approved, the commission may use the funds in the Designated Collection Fund directly for the needs listed in section 81-2510.
(4) A majority of the commission members constitutes a quorum for the purpose of conducting business. All actions of the commission shall be made by a majority vote of the voting members.
